details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.7.8 Extension schemas - Extension schema definition
details.description: The Schema type is an XMP structure containing the definition of an extension schema. The field namespace URI is "http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/schema#". The required field namespace prefix is pdfaSchema. The Schema type includes the following fields: pdfaSchema:schema (Text), pdfaSchema:namespaceURI (URI), pdfaSchema:prefix (Text), pdfaSchema:property (Seq Property), pdfaSchema:valueType (Seq ValueType).
